The correct answer is A: [00:00:46 - 00:02:11]. 

In this section of the audio, the speaker describes how they will demonstrate the action camera's loop record mode as a dashcam on and off the motorcycle. They mention using the Quad Lock charger to start and stop the recording, as well as the ability to control the camera remotely using a fast preview button that can be worn like a watch. The visuals also confirm that the camera is mounted on the motorcycle handlebars.
